mapper.select: select id, user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, goods_type, apply_time, apply_reason, end_time, type, is_applied, status, number, order_item_id from oomall_aftersales_service where user_id=#{userId} and is_deleted=0;
mapper.update: update oomall_aftersales_service set gmt_modified=#{gmtModified}, is_deleted=#{beDeleted}, goods_type=#{goodsType}, apply_time=#{applyTime}, apply_reason=#{applyReason}, end_time=#{endTime}, type=#{type}, is_applied=#{beApplied}, status=#{statusCode}, number=#{number}, order_item_id=#{orderItemId} where id=#{id} ;
mapper.insert: insert into oomall_aftersales_service( user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, goods_type, apply_time, apply_reason, end_time, type, is_applied, status, number, order_item_id ) values( #{userId}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{beDeleted}, #{goodsType}, #{applyTime}, #{applyReason}, #{endTime}, #{type}, #{beApplied}, #{statusCode}, #{number}, #{orderItemId} )
